respStmt.resp: TEI-compatible XML markup by Sahilia Ramirez with corrections by Name, Name, and Name.

publicationStmt.p: Transcribed by Sahilia Ramirez, summer 2016, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College
